name: Special Turrets
raw: Type 1: Cold Laser Turret ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots" "202534" #L "Turret Construction Base" "202583" #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" #L "Revolving Cold Laser" "202780" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots + Turret Construction Base = #L "Turret Controller" "202584" Skills: | ME,NP | ------------------------------ Turret Controller + Revolving Cold Laser = #L "Cold Laser Turret Controller" "202588" Skills: | ME,WS | ------------------------------ HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate + Cold Laser Turret Controller = #L "Cold Laser Turret" "203080" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Type 2: Corrosive Turret ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots" "202534" #L "Turret Construction Base" "202583" #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" #L "Sentient Corrosion Sprayer" "202783" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots + Turret Construction Base = #L "Turret Controller" "202584" Skills: | ME,NP | ------------------------------ Turret Controller + Sentient Corrosion Sprayer = #L "Sentient Corrosion Turret Controller" "202590" Skills: | ME,WS | ------------------------------ HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate + Sentient Corrosion Turret Controller = #L "Sentient Corrosive Turret" "203085" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Type 3: X-11 Ejector Turret ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots" "202534" #L "Turret Construction Base" "202583" #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" #L "Augias X-11 Ejector" "202785" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Cloud of Infuriated Nanobots + Turret Construction Base = #L "Turret Controller" "202584" Skills: | ME,NP | ------------------------------ Turret Controller + Augias X-11 Ejector = #L "X-11 Ejector Turret Controller" "202592" Skills: | ME,WS | ------------------------------ HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate + X-11 Ejector Turret Controller = #L "X-11 Ejector Turret" "203089" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ The best towers in the game are the ones you build yourself, and these are no exception. The weapons used in the process are difficult to get your hands on though.
